attributes.action: Shut all schools so it is safer for pupils and staff.
attributes.background: Close down all the schools however still have pupils participating in online learning. This will mean that the pupils will still get their correct predicted grades by handing in coursework however we will all be in a much safer environment. It will be better and the virus will begin to slow down.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Keep schools closed until Covid 19 is no longer a threat
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404
